LanguageData.FermenterVat.label: Fermenter Vat
LanguageData.FermenterVat.description: Grants the ability to build the fermenter vat. A large wooden fermentation vessel.
LanguageData.Fermenter.label: Fermenter
LanguageData.Fermenter.description: Grants the ability to build the fermenter. An automated machine to make processed food products.
LanguageData.FRMT_OilPlants.label: Oil plants
LanguageData.FRMT_OilPlants.description: Grants the ability to grow plants with oil producing products.
LanguageData.FRMT_OilTrees.label: Oil trees
LanguageData.FRMT_OilTrees.description: Grants the ability to grow trees with oil producing products.
